item.title: On choosing independence... for a software developer
item.description: É tempo! Independência ou Morte! Estamos separados de Portugal!Rant in the woods

item.title: Hello there!
item.description: General Kenobi! You are a bold one...Hey, so... I'm thinking of making this my brain dump blog to just do some writing on tech/programming matters now and then. I'm not sure how wide the subject range might be, but I'll probably rant on things I've had to fix lately, or maybe some different things I've bumped into.
